summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7506 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
